name: Charlie El. Awbery a.k.a. Rin’dzin Pamo

tweets.text:
okay I’ll bite…

1 like = 1 vacuous Buddhist platitude

I’ll use #VacuousBuddhistPlatitudes which you can mute if you don’t want to see these tweets. https://t.co/OrCyXu1pr4

.@vgr suggests alternation between opposing viewpoints which could be fun + informative. Otoh, it might be provocatively useful to leave some #VacuousBuddhistPlatitudes hanging. So I’ll save any substantive commentary for separate follow up tweets.

@vgr I’ll not direct quote any living individual or group, these are all pulled out of the ether (or the Buddhist canon). So if the #VacuousBuddhistPlatitudes happen to match some specific branding blurb, well that’s because…

Apparently @vgr didn’t suggest this and I’m confused!

But I think it’s a good idea anyway, so I’ll do it. https://t.co/E5lK032ZaU

@vgr 1/ Suitable for beginners and advanced practitioners alike

#VacuousBuddhistPlatitudes
@vgr omg I am rubbish at this, I already mixed up the thread and did two no. 1s

4/ We have no idea what the Buddha said, we’re not even 100% confident he existed. 

The earliest reference to what the Buddha said is centuries later than his supposed life. 

#VacuousBuddhistPlatitudes
